entry.def: If you say that something happens throughout a particular period of time, you mean that it happens during the whole of that period.
entry.tran: 自始至终;从头到尾;贯穿

example.ex: The national tragedy of rival groups killing each other continued throughout 1990...
example.tran: 敌对派别相互残杀的国家悲剧 1990 年全年都在上演。

example.ex: Movie music can be made memorable because its themes are repeated throughout the film.
example.tran: 电影音乐要想让人记住不难，因为它的主旋律贯穿影片始终。

entry.def: If you say that something happens or exists throughout a place, you mean that it happens or exists in all parts of that place.

example.ex: 'Sight Savers', founded in 1950, now runs projects throughout Africa, the Caribbean and South East Asia...
example.tran: 创始于 1950 年的国际防盲及救盲组织如今在非洲、加勒比海地区和东南亚各地都开展项目。

example.ex: As we have tried to show throughout this book, companies that provide outstanding service don't do it by luck.
example.tran: 正如我们一直想在本书中努力表明的那样，提供优质服务的公司靠的不是运气。

means.word_mean: 2. used to refer to cited works
